parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query region IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of an instance. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The mode of the instance. Valid values:

*   `instance`: reserved storage mode
*   `ALIYUN::GPDB::INSTANCE`: elastic storage mode
